Title: CamPaint .NET
Description: CamPaint - web-camera capture or open file from disk and paint over with Microsoft Ink Tools. Software is adapted for touch screen interface. Developed with VB.NET and WPF, uses Framework 4.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
CamPaint - web-camera capture or open file from disk and paint over with Microsoft Ink Tools. Software is adapted for touch screen interface. Developed with VB.NET and WPF, uses Framework 4.

Useful code samples:
  • WPF and UI animation, camera view and capture, file drag and drop, .NET Ink tools, color capture, image file saving





Basic features:
  • web-camera image capture
  • painting over
  • image saving

Version 1.2 new features:
  • drag-and-drop images to application
  • window move support
  • few interface and file saving fixes

Future versions features:
  • picture emailing (facebooking, twittering),
  • better brush selection interface,
  • drag-out for save file,
  • save/load ink strokes,
  • desktop image capture
